settings.title: Boot The Scoot!™
settings.text: Glandex® was created by veterinarians specifically to help support healthy anal gland function in dogs and cats. The patented Glandex formula contains unique ingredients designed to support healthy bowels, digestion, occasional allergies, and enhances the immune response. Made in the USA with all-natural ingredients including Pumpkin Seed, Probiotics, Omega Fatty Acids, Digestive Enzymes, & more!

settings.title: Unique FIber Blend with Pumpkin
settings.text: Including Pumpkin Seed & Apple Pectin to support healthy stools which naturally empty the anal glands

settings.title: Vet Formulated & Recommended
settings.text: With Probiotics & Digestive Enzymes to support a healthy GI tract and healthy anal glands

settings.title: Helps Your Pet to Boot the Scoot!
settings.text: Glandex's patented formula contains omega fatty acids and other key ingredients to help boot the scoot!™

settings.testimonial:
If you’re tired of frequent visits to your veterinarian for dog anal gland expression, it’s time to try Glandex, an effective, safe, and natural solution for dog anal gland problems.

Dr. Anna Coffin, DVM - Guthrie Pet Hospital

The fact that Glandex has a peanut butter chew, means that there’s a great option for dogs who suffer from food allergies. I highly recommend this supplement to prevent anal gland problems in pets!

Dr. Jason Nicholas, DVM - The Preventive Vet

As a clinician, a product like Glandex that is formulated with safe and effective all-natural ingredients affords me a non-drug option to promote anal gland health in my patients.

Dr. Christopher Byers, DVM - Internal Medicine Specialist

settings.title: Anal Gland Symptoms
settings.text:
Anal gland problems are extremely common in pets.
• Scooting and licking the rear
• Foul or fishy odor from your pet
• Straining to defecate
• Swelling and/or pain near rear end

settings.title: Find Glandex® Near You
settings.text: Glandex® is carried and recommended by thousands of veterinarians in 25 countries worldwide.

settings.text:

• All-Natural premium ingredients

settings.heading: GLANDEX® SUPPORTS HEALTHY ANAL GLANDS
settings.content: Glandex® was created by veterinarians specifically to help support healthy anal gland function in dogs and cats. Glandex's patented formula contains unique ingredients designed to support healthy bowels, digestion, immunity, and allergies. Made in the USA with all-natural ingredients including Pumpkin Seed, Probiotics, Omega Fatty Acids, Digestive Enzymes, & more!

settings.question: Patented formula with key ingredients
settings.answer: Glandex's® patented scientific formula contains a unique fiber blend and key ingredients including omega fatty acids, probiotics, and enzymes to help support healthy anal glands and a healthy gastrointestinal tract.

settings.question: Unique Fiber blend with Pumpkin
settings.answer: Including Pumpkin Seed & Apple Pectin to support healthy stools which naturally empty the anal glands

settings.question: Vet Formulated and recommended
settings.answer: With Probiotics & Digestive Enzymes to support a healthy GI tract and healthy anal glands

settings.question: Made in the USA with all natural ingredients
settings.answer: All of our nutritional supplements are NASC approved and produced at an FDA registered & cGMP compliant facility with natural, human-grade ingredients specifically sourced and formulated to provide the highest nutritional health benefits.

settings.name: Pumpkin Seeds
settings.info: Helps bulk and firm the stool

settings.name: Flaxseed
settings.info: High in omega fatty acids to support healthy glands

settings.name: Bromelain
settings.info: Promotes digestion & maintains normal histamine levels

settings.heading: Glandex® Helps Leave Scooting Behind
settings.content: Glandex is veterinarian formulated through years of research and clinical testing. With its unique patented formula, Glandex works from the inside out to support natural emptying of the anal glands and promotes anal gland health.
